p.hi: I lunched with Knox at the National Liberal Club,
& afterwards met Tim Healy in the corridor
. Then I called by appointment at the Foreign Office, & had a short interview with Lord Salisbury about the Hospital.
He was most kind, thanked me for what I had done at Ilford, & expressed himself in very flattering terms about my appointment to Westminster
. I pressed as far as I dared the claims of the Archdeacon to be appointed to the Hospital.
